Articles.Content:
Hi, I thought this would be challenging enough and fun, to be a good challenge!

Rules:

- Build a rocket with large capsule

- Do 2 orbits around kerbin

- Land your capsule close as possible to the lauch site

- You are not allowed to use any aiding addons, only manual controls.

(EDIT) - Any kind of thrust mods are not allowed after de-orbit when going under 30km. I didnt use any even above 30km.

My landing ended up 166m away if I remember correctly.

P.S. Sorry if this is a double post, but first one didnt show up if this is a second one.

Edited February 13, 2014 by RocketBoy

Welcome to the community RocketBoy

The first post was missed by the moderators, sorry about that, I'll set you to bottle rocketeer so you don't have to worry about your posts not showing up.

Good luck with your challenge
